009package Ch16_ColorEdges;
010
011
012import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.addToDialog;
013import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.getFromDialog;
014
015import java.util.List;
016
017import ij.IJ;
018import ij.ImagePlus;
019import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
020import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
021import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
022import imagingbook.common.edges.CannyEdgeDetector;
023import imagingbook.common.edges.CannyEdgeDetector.Parameters;
024import imagingbook.common.edges.EdgeTrace;
025
026/**
027 * This plugin implements the Canny edge detector for all types of images.
028 * @author WB
029 * @version 2021/11/26
030 * @version 2022/03/22 revised dialog
031 */
032public class Color_Edges_Canny implements PlugInFilter {
033        
034        static boolean showEdgeMagnitude = true;
035        static boolean showEdgeOrientation = true;
036        static boolean showBinaryEdges = true;
037        static boolean listEdgeTraces = false;
038        
039        ImagePlus imp = null;
040        
041        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus imp) {
042                this.imp = imp;
043                return DOES_ALL + NO_CHANGES;
044        }
045
046        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
047                
048                Parameters params = new Parameters();
049                if (!runDialog(params)) return;
050                
051                CannyEdgeDetector detector = new CannyEdgeDetector(ip, params);
052                
053                if (showEdgeMagnitude) {
054                        ImageProcessor eMag = detector.getEdgeMagnitude();
055                        (new ImagePlus("Canny Edge Magnitude sigma=" + params.gSigma, eMag)).show();
056                }
057                
058                if (showEdgeOrientation) {
059                        ImageProcessor eOrt = detector.getEdgeOrientation();
060                        (new ImagePlus("Canny Edge Orientation sigma=" + params.gSigma, eOrt)).show();
061                }
062                
063                if (showBinaryEdges) {
064                        ImageProcessor eBin = detector.getEdgeBinary();
065                        (new ImagePlus("Canny Binary Edges sigma=" + params.gSigma, eBin)).show();
066                }
067                
068                if(listEdgeTraces) {
069                        List<EdgeTrace> edgeTraces = detector.getEdgeTraces();
070                        IJ.log("number of edge traces: " + edgeTraces.size());
071                        int i = 0;
072                        for (EdgeTrace et : edgeTraces) {
073                                IJ.log(i + ". " + et.toString());
074                                i++;
075                        }
076                }
077        }
078
079        private boolean runDialog(Parameters params) {
080                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
081                // Canny parameters:
082                addToDialog(params, gd);
083                // plugin parameters:
084                gd.addMessage("Plugin parameters:");
085                gd.addCheckbox("Show edge magnitude", showEdgeMagnitude);
086                gd.addCheckbox("Show edge orientation", showEdgeOrientation); 
087                gd.addCheckbox("Show binary edges", showBinaryEdges);
088                gd.addCheckbox("List edge traces", listEdgeTraces);
089                // display dialog
090                gd.showDialog();
091                if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
092                        return false;
093                }       
094                // update Canny parameters:
095                getFromDialog(params, gd);
096                if (params.gSigma < 0.5f) params.gSigma = 0.5f;
097                if (params.gSigma > 20) params.gSigma = 20;
098                
099                // update plugin parameters:
100                showEdgeMagnitude = gd.getNextBoolean();
101                showEdgeOrientation = gd.getNextBoolean();
102                showBinaryEdges = gd.getNextBoolean();
103                listEdgeTraces = gd.getNextBoolean();
104                return true;
105        }
106        
107}
